ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/28/1999 10:38:05 AM Central Standard Time, judy3t@usa.net writes:  Salutations Dnaisha! Wow! and thank
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/28/1999 10:38:05 AM Central Standard Time,
judy3t@... writes:

<< Welcome to the addiction... >>

Salutations Dnaisha!
Wow! and thank you for all the great advice! You really sound like you have a
handle on it.
Well, as you may have read I decided on Bard but am so far having serious
problems playing. Everytime I try my computer locks up and I have to actually
pull the soundcard to get it to reboot. Not fun :o(
Anyway, I'm hoping I'll get something figured out. My little taste of the
game was enough to wet my appitate.
:o/
Brangvyne "Bran"
